title: S2 E12 USSOCOM Commander GEN Richard D. Clarke
description:
The Commander of USSOCOM GEN Richard D. Clarke returns to SOFcast for our season finale! General Clarke discusses leadership and accountability, the evolving global role of SOCOM, and why "we can't take our foot off the gas" in taking care of SOF servicemembers.

Subscribe and leave us a review!
